name: No Limits Aviation
about: No Limits Aviation, located in Coeur d'Alene, Idaho, is North Idaho's premier flight school, catering to aspiring pilots of all levels. We offer a range of training programs, including Light Sport Aircraft (LSA) and Private Pilot (PPL) certifications, as well as specialized tailwheel training. Our experienced instructors and state-of-the-art facilities ensure a comprehensive and safe learning environment. Whether you're a beginner or looking to advance your flying skills, No Limits Aviation is dedicated to helping you achieve your aviation dreams. Join us to take to the skies and become aviation's newest pilot.
